text: To examine the role of each of the three RUNX binding sites for the <extra_id_0> FOXP3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> promoter activity , we mutated each individually or in combination .

No reduction in <extra_id_0> luciferase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> activity was observed when the -53 site was mutated and only a slight reduction when either the -287 or -333 site was mutated ( Fig . 4 B ) .
